LanguageData.GeneR_LogarithmicHelp: Work per complexity decreases as complexity increases (Max work at 24C).
LanguageData.GeneR_LinearHelp: Work is proportional to complexity (Max work at 24C).
LanguageData.GeneR_ExponentialHelp: Work per complexity increases as complexity increases (Max work at 24C).
LanguageData.GeneR_NeutroamineBaseHelp: At least this much Neutroamine should be used per job.
LanguageData.GeneR_NeutroamineCompHelp: How much more Neutroamine should be added per gene complexity.
LanguageData.GeneR_GenepackConsumeHelp: Should the genepacks being used be destroyed after the job completes?
LanguageData.GeneR_MaterialsHelp: How much of each resource is needed to construct this building.
LanguageData.GeneR_MatCompHelp: The amount of components needed to construct the Reprocessor.
LanguageData.GeneR_MatAdvCompHelp: The amount of advanced components needed to construct the Reprocessor.
LanguageData.GeneR_MatSteelHelp: The amount of steel needed to construct the Reprocessor.
LanguageData.GeneR_MatPlasteelHelp: The amount of plasteel needed to construct the Reprocessor.
LanguageData.GeneR_MatGoldHelp: The amount of gold needed to construct the Reprocessor.
LanguageData.GeneR_BuildWorkHelp: The amount labor to construct the building.
LanguageData.GeneR_MassHelp: How heavy this building is. More mass makes transporting this difficult.
LanguageData.GeneR_FlamHelp: How vulnerable this building is to fire damage. At 0, it will never burn.
LanguageData.GeneR_BuildSkillHelp: The minimal construction skill needed to build this.
LanguageData.GeneR_MinifyHelp: Can this building be uninstalled and reinstalled.
LanguageData.GeneR_CanSeparateHelp: Can the Genepack Reprocessor separate genes?
LanguageData.GeneR_SeparateMultiplierHelp: The multiplier for how long separating takes.
LanguageData.GeneR_CanDuplicateHelp: Can the Genepack Reprocessor duplicate genes?
LanguageData.GeneR_DuplicateMultiplierHelp: The multiplier for how long duplicating takes.
LanguageData.GeneR_CanMergeHelp: Can the Genepack Reprocessor merge genes?
LanguageData.GeneR_MergeMultiplierHelp: The multiplier for how long merging takes.
LanguageData.GeneR_SetsSaved: Building settings require restarting to update. Job settings applied for next job.
LanguageData.GeneR_SetDefaultHelp: Resets all settings to the mod's default.
LanguageData.GeneR_ResearchMesDes:
You now have the technology to build a genepack reprocessor - but it also requires advanced components. You can collect advanced components several ways:

 -All outlander settlements sell advanced components. Send a caravan to buy some.
 -Some visiting traders sell advanced components. Invite or wait for them.
 -Some quests are rewarded with advanced components.
